text: Altererythrobacter lauratis is a Gram-negative, moderately thermophilic, rod- shaped and motile bacterium from the genus of Altererythrobacter which has been isolated from the Tagejia hot spring from Tibet. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Altererythrobacter lauratis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Altererythrobacter lauratis
